participants.name: Danny Mallon
participants.url: Percussion Instructor/Department Mannes Prep and Next Divisions at Mannes School of Music

messages.message:
Brian
The Ghosthunting was great!  Where are the pics?  Also after looking back at the pictures I realized the little spots could be dust! Pretty silly to jump to such wild conclusions about ghosts, but then I realized you had lots of pictures without flash that still had spots, I don't know, it will take some more looking into.  We took some pictures in New Orleans of Madam Lalaurie's house and didn't see any spots.

Brian
Shaaaaammeeeeee! Our dogs eat better than your GF?  Happy Valentines!  Take her to a nice dinner plz.  And buy her a puppy to make up for everything.  Thank you.  -Love Brian and Iga

Colleen eats better food than most people I know, she's just about to eat caviar and a Moroccan fish dish, but I did see that the pups are eating some home cooked love;) She's spoiled rotten, which she deserves;) 
 I did see the pups and they are adorable, I've been thinking about it;)
 Happy Valentines to you both!
 I saw the pups, they look so cute.
